Logo Type.name: header_structure
Logo Type.help: Text uses forum's sitename and description. Option defaults to 'logo and text' if unselected here.

Header Background Repeat.name: header_repeat
Header Background Repeat.help: Repeats the header background image. Default value: 'none'.

Header Background Position.name: header_position
Header Background Position.help: Sets position for header background. Default value: 'middle top'.

Header Tint?.name: header_tint
Header Tint?.help: Applies a dark tint over the header background. Useful for bright header backgrounds. Default value: No.

Stretch header background to fill space?.name: header_size
Stretch header background to fill space?.help: Stretches background image to fill header space. Only recommended for large backgrounds that don't repeat. Default value: No.

Navbar Colour.name: navbar_colour
Navbar Colour.help: Navigation that runs along the top of the forum. Defaults to 'dark' if unselected here.

Theme Accent Colour.name: advanced_accent_colour
Theme Accent Colour.help: Select colour of category headers, links and buttons.

High contrast footer links?.name: footer_link_contrast
High contrast footer links?.help: Enable this if you have selected a dark accent colour above.

Forum Width.name: forum_width
Forum Width.help: Must be fixed width (px) or fluid (%). Recommended values: 1200px or 95%. Defaults to 95% if unselected here.

Enable Right Sidebar?.name: right_sidebar
Enable Right Sidebar?.help: Content sidebar showing on all pages. Content set in code block below. Defaults to 'off' if unselected here.

Enable Social bar?.name: socialbar
Enable Social bar?.help: Footer strip showing social links. Defaults to 'on' if unselected here.

Enable Scroll to Top button?.name: scroll_to_top
Enable Scroll to Top button?.help: Adds a scroll to top shortcut on long pages. Default setting: No

Enable Collapsible Panels.name: collapsible_panels
Enable Collapsible Panels.help: Allows users to collapse / expand forum categories. Default setting: No

Show topic creation time on viewforum?.name: show_topic_creation_time
Show topic creation time on viewforum?.help: Displays the time/date a topic was created. Clutters layout. Default setting: No

Postprofile Side.name: postprofile_side
Postprofile Side.help: Sets which side avatars / post counts display on when reading a topic. Default setting: Left.

Show user 'Joined' date on viewtopic?.name: join_date_viewtopic
Show user 'Joined' date on viewtopic?.help: Displays the user's 'joined' date below avatar. Clutters layout. Default setting: No

Hide PlanetStyles link in footer?.name: credit_line
Hide PlanetStyles link in footer?.help: We'd rather you didn't, but it's OK if you really want to :)
